title: Division 4. Episode 100: Return of John Kelso
other_title: Division 4. Episode 100: The Return of John Kelso
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Assault and battery
abstract: When former standover man John Kelso (John Fegan) returns home on parole, the neighbours in his small suburban street are fearful his reign of terror will start again and they retaliate with a vicious assault.
description: John Kelso appears to be a shambling, confused old man however the terrified reactions of those around him make us suspect he is planning something terrible. The story becomes a striking, disturbing portrayal of the cruelty of a community seizing the opportunity to terrorise the man who once terrorised them.  This hour of drama was 'Division 4's most awarded individual episode, winning a Penguin Award, an AWGIE Award and a Logie for guest star John Fegan. Fegan was one of Australia's first on-screen detectives as Inspector Connolly in Homicide (1964-75).
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002772; Top Rating Australian Police Dramas 1964-1983; Active; 2013
